version_description:
Tutorial Optimizations
Mission Display Bug Fix
Version Overwrite Bug Fix

Chinese New Year is here!

- Collect piggy banks, gold nuggets and festive Red Packets to claim awesome prizes in Endless Mode's newest event!
- Year of the Pig-Man! Trot to the top with the chance to secure this exclusive new team member!
- New year, new look! Jam-packed with holiday-inspired fun!

Happy grappling!

Spring Event
Collect flowers during the Spring event and exchange them for goodies!

-There’s a brand new mountain – Olympia Freeze – with 10 new levels to ascend and conquer!
-30 new survivors to find and rescue;
-New Mechanic: Hard Ice now has a time limit, so don’t hang around for too long;
-Some of the tutorials have been simplified and polished. +10 for gameplay and comfort!
-Other minor tweaks and changes for a smoother mountaineering experience.

Test your speedy skills and ascend before the clock runs out with the all-new Time Challenge mode!
Free things! Log in everyday to receive a useful little gift. It could be coins or gadgets, so check in regularly to collect!
Look! An all-new weekly VIP subscription service! Try it out for three whole days, free!

It’s Hang Line’s Summer break special and the heat is on with this new update!

1.Ascend the volcanic peaks in search of stranded tourists.

2.Collect tasty and refreshing treats to trade in for an all-new Blaze Fighter helicopter and Hula Climber character.

3.New gadget: Ice Blast! Don’t forget to pack that before you take off. Lava burns...

4.New special Daily Login bonuses! Players will receive a new helicopter (Hover Chopper) and character (Kyle) on day seven.

Don the most colorful Christmas attire you can find and get ready to ascend!

1. Keep an eye out in the peaks for ginger bread and stockings (they drop gold coins!)

2. Jump into a new extra frosty and festive Endless Mode in search of Christmas wreaths. Collect as many as you can and turn in for presents.

3. Coins, gear and an epic Christmas-themed helicopter are all up for grabs!

Happy holiday season, everyone!

The Easter Event is finally upon us!
New mountain:
- the Chocolate mountain is now available!
Four New levels:
- 1 Endless level, with Easter ornaments and Chocolate Waterfalls.
- 3 Normal levels, collect Easter Chicks 5 times faster than in the Endless level!
Easter Gifts:
- Exchange collected chicks for Gadgets, two new Helicopters (one of which a shiny Fire Balloon!) and an exclusive Easter Character

【Optimization】
Optimized Mountain’s displayed colour to match game map.

New mountain:
- the Sporty mountain is now available! Pick up medals, trophies, dumbbells and torches and receive coins for your efforts!
Four New levels:
- 1 Endless level with sportive decorations and playful mascots for you to collect and exchange for exclusive gifts!
- 3 Normal levels, with the collection of mascots 5x more efficient than the Infinite level!
Sporty Gifts:
- Exchange collected mascots for high-tech gadgets, a brand new Rat (!!!) Helicopter and an exclusive and athletic character!"

New content:
- Your biggest challenge has arrived! The hardest mountain you’ve ever had to face is now in Hang Line!
Watch out for some of these obstacles... One wrong step and it's all over!
This mountain only has one level, but it’s more challenging than you can imagine. Pass it and conquer this mountain!
